sentences.english: Said to be beheaded, will execute one as a warning to others.
sentences.chinese: 斩了，就会说成是杀一儆百。

sentences.english: The American authorities decided to let Lehman fail pour encourager les autres.
sentences.chinese: 美国当局决定杀一儆百让雷曼兄弟倒台。

sentences.english: Kill a man to warn a hundred is a necessary way to reduce crimes.
sentences.chinese: 杀一儆百是减少犯罪行为的必要手段。

sentences.english: The boss decided to fire him to make an example of him to the other employees.
sentences.chinese: 老板打算解雇他，以对其他员工杀一儆百。
